channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Pehla Sauda
channel.desc: The host analyses the relative strengths and weaknesses of key stocks and the likely impact of the international market and government policies on the economy.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: 10 Ke Damdaar Trade
channel.desc: The host talks to a panel of financial experts to analyse the latest stock market update and compare the shares of different companies to help investors choose their investments wisely.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Traders Hotline
channel.desc: The hosts present the latest economic headlines and interact with experts in the financial sector who share insightful advice and suggestions.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Khiladi No.1
channel.desc: The host invites three market experts to strategise and compete against each other in an attempt to advise viewers on potential investment opportunities in the stock market.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Gold Spot
channel.desc: The presenter discusses gold prices in India and abroad, shedding light on key elements that impact the rates and influence market fluctuations.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Commodity Round Up
channel.desc: The host provides an in-depth report on some of the latest updates, key developments and current trends in the commodities market.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Futures Express
channel.desc: The host provides a detailed report featuring the latest updates and key developments concerning futures and their performances across various sectors of the market.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Saas, Bahu Aur Sensex
channel.desc: The host invites professional analysts to discuss the latest stock market updates and trends, with a focus on investment opportunities for women traders.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Midcap Mantra
channel.desc: The host presents the latest business trends and updates pertaining to mid-cap companies and interacts with experts for their opinions.

channel.name: CNBC Awaaz IN
channel.title: Know Your Company
channel.desc: Expert advisors provide insightful information on investment tips for businesses and the financial performance of various companies.
